00044 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA[10] = { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','D','A','T','A' };
00045 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK[10] = { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','L','I','N','K' };

00048   struct forward_sort_clfi {
00049     bool operator()(const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi1, const CommitLogFileInfo &clfi2) const {
00050       return clfi1.num < clfi2.num;

00063 void CommitLog::initialize(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, CommitLogBase *init_log) {
00064   String compressor;
00065   m_fs = fs;
00066   m_log_dir = log_dir;
00067   m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00068   m_cur_fragment_num = 0;
00069 
00070   if (props_ptr) {
00071     m_max_fragment_size = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.RollLimit", HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_COMMITLOG_ROLLLIMIT);
00072     compressor = props_ptr->get("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.Compressor", HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_COMMITLOG_COMPRESSOR);
00073   }
00074   else {
00075     m_max_fragment_size = HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_COMMITLOG_ROLLLIMIT;
00076     compressor = HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_COMMITLOG_COMPRESSOR;
00077   }
00078 
00079   HT_INFOF("RollLimit = %lld", m_max_fragment_size);
00080 
00081   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(compressor);
00082 
00083   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash(m_log_dir);
00084 
00085   if (init_log) {
00086     stitch_in(init_log);
00087     foreach (const CommitLogFileInfo &frag, m_fragment_queue) {
00088       if (frag.num >= m_cur_fragment_num)
00089         m_cur_fragment_num = frag.num + 1;
00090     }
00091   }
00092   else {  // chose one past the max one found in the directory
00093     uint32_t num;
00094     std::vector<String> listing;
00095     m_fs->readdir(m_log_dir, listing);
00096     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00097       num = atoi(listing[i].c_str());
00098       if (num >= m_cur_fragment_num)
00099         m_cur_fragment_num = num + 1;
00100     }
00101   }
00102 
00103   m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00104 
00105   try {
00106     m_fs->mkdirs(m_log_dir);
00107     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00108   }
00109   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00110     HT_ERRORF("Problem initializing commit log '%s' - %s (%s)", m_log_dir.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00111     throw;
00112   }
00113 }

00121 uint64_t CommitLog::get_timestamp() {
00122   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00123   boost::xtime now;
00124   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00125   return ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (uint64_t)now.nsec;
00126 }

00134 int CommitLog::write(DynamicBuffer &buffer, uint64_t timestamp) {
00135   int error;
00136   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_DATA, timestamp);
00137 
00141   if ((error = compress_and_write(buffer, &header, timestamp)) != Error::OK)
00142     return error;
00143 
00147   if (m_cur_fragment_length > m_max_fragment_size) {
00148     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00149     error = roll();
00150   }
00151   else
00152     error = Error::OK;
00153 
00154   return error;
00155 }

00161 int CommitLog::link_log(CommitLogBase *log_base, uint64_t timestamp) {
00162   int error;
00163   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_LINK, timestamp);
00164   DynamicBuffer input;
00165   String &log_dir = log_base->get_log_dir();
00166 
00167   input.ensure(header.length());
00168 
00169   header.set_compression_type(BlockCompressionCodec::NONE);
00170   header.set_data_length(log_dir.length() + 1);
00171   header.set_data_zlength(log_dir.length() + 1);
00172   header.set_data_checksum(fletcher32(log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length()+1));
00173 
00174   header.encode(&input.ptr);
00175   input.add(log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length() + 1);
00176 
00177   try {
00178     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00179     size_t amount = input.fill();
00180     StaticBuffer send_buf(input);
00181 
00182     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, Filesystem::O_FLUSH);
00183     assert(timestamp != 0);
00184     m_last_timestamp = timestamp;
00185     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00186 
00187     if ((error = roll()) != Error::OK)
00188       return error;
00189 
00190     // Stitch in the fragment queue from the log being linked
00191     // in to the current fragment queue of the current log
00192     stitch_in(log_base);
00193 
00194   }
00195   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00196     HT_ERRORF("Problem linking external log into commit log - %s", e.what());
00197     return e.code();
00198   }
00199 
00200   return Error::OK;
00201 }

00207 int CommitLog::close() {
00208 
00209   try {
00210     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00211     if (m_fd > 0)
00212       m_fs->close(m_fd);
00213   }
00214   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00215     HT_ERRORF("Problem closing commit log file '%s' - %s (%s)",
00216               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00217     return e.code();
00218   }
00219 
00220   m_fd = 0;
00221 
00222   return Error::OK;
00223 }

00230 int CommitLog::purge(uint64_t timestamp) {
00231   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00232   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00233   String fname;
00234 
00235   try {
00236 
00237     while (!m_fragment_queue.empty()) {
00238       file_info = m_fragment_queue.front();
00239       if (file_info.timestamp < timestamp) {
00240         fname = file_info.log_dir + file_info.num;
00241         m_fs->remove(fname);
00242         m_fragment_queue.pop_front();
00243         HT_INFOF("Removed log fragment file='%s' timestamp=%lld", fname.c_str(), file_info.timestamp);
00244       }
00245       else {
00246         //HT_INFOF("LOG FRAGMENT PURGE breaking because %lld >= %lld", file_info.timestamp, timestamp);
00247         break;
00248       }
00249     }
00250 
00251   }
00252   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00253     HT_ERRORF("Problem purging log fragment fname = '%s'", fname.c_str());
00254     return e.code();
00255   }
00256 
00257   return Error::OK;
00258 }

00260 
00264 int CommitLog::roll() {
00265   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00266 
00267   if (m_last_timestamp == 0)
00268     return Error::OK;
00269 
00270   try {
00271 
00272     m_fs->close(m_fd);
00273 
00274     file_info.log_dir = m_log_dir;
00275     file_info.num = m_cur_fragment_num;
00276     file_info.size = m_cur_fragment_length;
00277     file_info.timestamp = m_last_timestamp;
00278     file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00279     file_info.block_stream = 0;
00280 
00281     m_fragment_queue.push_back(file_info);
00282 
00283     m_last_timestamp = 0;
00284     m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00285 
00286     m_cur_fragment_num++;
00287     m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00288 
00289     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00290   }
00291   catch (Exception &e) {
00292     HT_ERRORF("Problem rolling commit log: %s: %s",
00293               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00294     return e.code();
00295   }
00296 
00297   return Error::OK;
00298 }

00305 int CommitLog::compress_and_write(DynamicBuffer &input, BlockCompressionHeader *header, uint64_t timestamp) {
00306   int error = Error::OK;
00307   EventPtr event_ptr;
00308   DynamicBuffer zblock;
00309 
00310   // Compress block and kick off log write (protected by lock)
00311   try {
00312     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00313 
00314     m_compressor->deflate(input, zblock, *header);
00315 
00316     size_t amount = zblock.fill();
00317     StaticBuffer send_buf(zblock);
00318 
00319     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, Filesystem::O_FLUSH);
00320     assert(timestamp != 0);
00321     assert(timestamp != 0);
00322     m_last_timestamp = timestamp;
00323     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00324   }
00325   catch (Exception &e) {
00326     HT_ERRORF("Problem writing commit log: %s: %s",
00327               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00328     error = e.code();
00329   }
00330 
00331   return error;
00332 }

00339 void CommitLog::load_fragment_priority_map(LogFragmentPriorityMap &frag_map) {
00340   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00341   uint64_t cumulative_total = m_cur_fragment_length;
00342   uint32_t distance = 0;
00343   LogFragmentPriorityData frag_data;
00344 
00345   if (m_last_timestamp != 0) {
00346     frag_data.distance = distance++;
00347     frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00348     frag_map[m_last_timestamp] = frag_data;
00349   }
00350 
00351   for (std::deque<CommitLogFileInfo>::reverse_iterator iter = m_fragment_queue.rbegin(); iter != m_fragment_queue.rend(); iter++) {
00352     cumulative_total += (*iter).size;
00353     frag_data.distance = distance++;
00354     frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00355     frag_map[(*iter).timestamp] = frag_data;
00356   }
00357 
00358 }
